nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Person1,    Thank you for the follow up. At this point of time can I please ask you to set up a virtual call with Dr  Person2 as I want to  Person3 with her re next steps in light of Dr  Person4 recommendation. So no need to schedule anything besides the call with Dr Person2 Thank you for your help    Best
